'''''A Leisurely Journey''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to have collected nine chests from locations depicted by the [[Aranyaka (Gadget)|Mysterious Clipboard]] before completing the quest [[Static Views, Part 2]].

The player will need to have acquired the [[Shriveled Seed]] from the [[Roots of the Valley of Life]] located in [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]] for this quest to start.<ref>[[Static Views, Part 2]]</ref><!--To complete this achievement, the player needs to -->
